title: RCYH13
author: RCYH13
content: Hey folks, I'm new to the NFT space and was wondering if there are any NFT creators and artists here willing to chat about his/her NFT journey thus far? Thanks in advance!! üôè

comments.author: papundekli22
comments.created_time: October 02, 2022, 01:12:12 AMLast edit: October 02, 2022, 01:40:32 AM by papundekli22
comments.body: Hello ¬†I just found your post and I am really inerested in it. I am an artist and content ceator, making my manually created works into digital art NFTs and more, with historical message and cultural value, but also with an educative effort. I can help you if you want. May youcan use my already created works or I am able to do content for you for any historical or other themes. I studied cultural studies, history, semiotics and last three years of my university studies specialized on marketing semiotics strategies in history and culture. My created works on blockchain are suited in different way, so may you can communicate some topics you want and I will make it for you. iF you are interested, please contact me here. Look at my collection and rate it pls here is a link : https://opensea.io/ADAMASFullfeelmentcompanyI am looking forward.Bye ¬†Best Regards Papundekli22

comments.author: qzl9899
comments.body: My self-made NFT is special. It is based on Chinese characters and poetry. I think, no matter what, at least these NFTs can prove that the copyright of the poems they carry is created by me, right?

comments.author: RCYH13
comments.body: Quote from: qzl9899 on October 05, 2022, 03:20:30 AMMy self-made NFT is special. It is based on Chinese characters and poetry. I think, no matter what, at least these NFTs can prove that the copyright of the poems they carry is created by me, right?That is correct! The NFTs are always associated with your wallet/smart contract address, timestamped and validated on the blockchain (public ledger). I'd love to chat and learn about your NFT journey thus far
